rooms.name: Entrance Hall with North Facing Entrance
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that is aligned with Vastu principles for the north direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Bohemian styled living room with earthy colors and natural materials.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space incorporating Indian aesthetics with traditional elements like a raised platform.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: spacious master bedroom designed for rest and relaxation, with Bohemian decor.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with water-efficient fixtures and natural light.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the north-facing design.
Window for natural light in entrance hall.
Large window to maximize daylight and maintain Vastu balance.
Window for ventilation in the kitchen area.
Bathroom door ensuring privacy and proper air circulation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest bedroom designed with Bohemian style and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Study/Reading Room
rooms.description: A dedicated study area to enhance creativity and productivity.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A balcony offering outdoor space with a view of the swimming pool and greenery.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the upper floor with the ground floor.
Window to provide natural light and maintain Vastu balance in the guest bedroom.
Window ensuring adequate ventilation and lighting for the study room.

external_features.name: Swimming Pool
external_features.description: An in-ground swimming pool designed for leisure and relaxation with a Bohemian aesthetic.

external_features.name: Garden Space
external_features.description: A landscaped garden area that enhances natural aesthetics and complies with Vastu principles.

vastu_considerations: North-facing entrance ensures positivity and good energy flow.
Balanced distribution of rooms according to Vastu directions.
Natural light is maximized through strategically placed windows.
